de: Unabhängiges Haus. Geschlossenes Grundstück 400 m². Erdgeschoss: Wohn-/Esszimmer (Kamin, TV). Integrierte Küche (Mikrowelle). WC. 1 Zimmer für Personen mit eingeschränkter Mobilität zugänglich (1 Doppelbett, Badezimmer, WC). OG: Mezzanin. 1 Zimmer (1 Bett 160 x 200 cm). 1 Z. (1 Bett für 2 Pers., Duschbad). 1 Z. en: Independent house. Closed ground 400 m². First floor: living room (fireplace, TV). Integrated kitchen (microwave). WC. 1 bedroom accessible to people with reduced mobility (1 double bed, shower room, WC). Floor : mezzanine. 1 bedroom (1 bed 160 x 200 cm). 1 bedroom (1 double bed, shower room). 1 room (1 double bed, 1 single bed). 1 room (1 double bed). Bathroom with toilet. WC. Childcare equipment. Games room (table soccer, billiards). Electric heating. Bowling green. Cleaning option 70 ?. Shops on the spot. The chapel of Saint Berthaud on the spot. Horse-drawn carriage ride in summer. Sainte Olive 2 km. Signy l'Abbaye 7 km (many hiking trails). Reims 60 km.
